title: Lead Data Scientist
responsibilities: Spearheaded the implementation and optimization of various Large Language Models (LLMs) including OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, LLaMA, and Claude, driving innovation in AI-powered solutions.
Leveraged extensive knowledge of AWS and GCP services to architect and deploy scalable, cloud-based AI systems, integrating software development best practices and systems engineering principles.
Pioneered the adoption of cutting-edge AI technologies and tools, such as Prompt flow, to significantly enhance user interaction and experience across multiple projects.
Demonstrated thought leadership by consistently staying abreast of and implementing the latest advancements in AI technologies, frameworks, and platforms.
Led the development of high-impact GENAI projects, including ChequeTech and Syne Agentic AI, focusing on advanced applications for Data Engineering, Data Analysis, and Big Data processing.
Mentored and guided cross-functional teams in the implementation of AI solutions, fostering a culture of innovation and technical excellence.

title: Senior Data Science Engineer
responsibilities: Worked on Retail Execution solution works with an intelligent Route-to-Market platform to automate business processes and improve field rep productivity to drive more sales.

Built solutions for various use cases including reducing out-of-stock, managing accounts, planning visits, processing orders, ensuring compliance, tracking assets, achieving Planogram adherence, conducting store audits and surveys, managing budgets, costs, credit limits, and expenses, managing contracts, e-sign documents, and tracking expiry.

Utilized technologies for end-to-end deployment including Python, Pytorch, Tensorflow, OpenCV, NLP, GPT, VAE, GANs, various transformer-based models, SQL, GitHub, Flask, Gunicorn and Nginx, AWS EC2, AWS S3 bucket, AWS Sagemaker, OCR, ML-Flow, Docker, Container, GradCam.
Designed, implemented, and evaluated new models and rapid software prototypes to solve problems in machine learning and systems engineering.
Collaborated with multi-disciplinary product development teams to identify performance improvement opportunities and integrate trained models.
Composed production-grade code to convert machine learning models into services and pipelines to be consumed at a web-scale.
Worked with stakeholders to develop quarterly roadmaps based on impact, effort, and test coordination.
Utilized advanced querying, visualization, and analytics tools to analyze and process complex data sets.
Assessed accuracy and effectiveness of new and existing data sources and data analysis techniques.
Identified, measured, and recommended improvement strategies for KPIs across business areas.

title: Project Engineer
responsibilities: Created customized applications to make critical predictions, automate reasoning and decisions, and calculate optimization algorithms.
Prototyped machine learning applications and quickly determined application viability.
Transformed raw data to conform to assumptions of the machine learning algorithm.
Worked on Image Processing module and POCs (e.g., Face, eyes, and smile recognition using OpenCV, Object Detection through SSD, and Image Creation using Deep Convolution GANs).
Strong technical knowledge of CNN, RNN, Transformer, and other deep learning algorithms.
Built custom convolution neural network architecture as well as implemented SOTA architectures.
Able to build NLP applications (e.g., Text Classification).

title: Associate Machine Learning Engineer
responsibilities: Designed and developed an object detection system to detect parking slots.
Transformed raw data to conform to assumptions of the machine learning algorithm.
Gathered and annotated real-time parking data and trained the model to increase accuracy by 20%.
Solved the problem of false detections in low light and night images by applying multiple data augmentation and image smoothening techniques, increasing accuracy by 5% more.
